page.title: 20SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: The area under survey has changed over the past six years and will be subject to further, more rapid changes in the future. A major social issue is the proposed A1-M1 link road. If approved this will cut across farmland close to Nasby and the historic battlefield. Although Clipston village has grown considerably over the past few years, the price of new housing is between 45- 64,000 pounds. Making it impossible for young people from the village to buy their own home within the village. Public transport is very limited, therefore the population generally is very dependent upon its own transport. Many families have by necessity to run two cars. Clipston is on the main flight path of fighter aircraft en route from R.A.F Wittering to Wales,disturbing the peace
